channel.title: Yzahkin Games Posts
channel.description: Yzahkin Games! Where small fun games born.

item.title: Every game neeeds assets... I can not do it all alone
item.description: Nearing the finish line Cupig's Key Collectathon still needed some assets. Like this meteor I made in Blender.

item.title: Game Translation Started
item.description: The development of Cupig's Key Collectathon has finally reached the point where I have finished the text for it. I have a nice JSON file with all the English text.

item.title: Not the finish line, but close
item.description: After two weeks of doing nothing game-related, I finally got back to work on the Cupig's Key Collectathon.

item.title: 66 levels to go
item.description: Here I am at the end of the year and I am way behind schedule. I finished the first world levels in Cupig's Key Collectathon and that is all.

item.title: A small blog writer
item.description: This little exacutable I made in Godot helps me in two ways. From now on I can just write a blog post in an editor. I also had a project so I could practice the Godot engine.

item.title: Making levels like crazy!
item.description: Creating levels for Cupig's Key Collectathon is not the easiest thing to do.

item.title: Godot is fun
item.description: Since my next game will be made in the Godot Engine, I really need to learn how to use it. So I started a little side project to learn the basics.

item.title: Reverse feature creep
item.description: From the beginning of the development of Cupig's Key Collectathon, I had a counter in the game that counted the times the player died. I had no real plan for it, but it was natural that it was there.

item.title: Getting wishlists is hard
item.description: Cupig's Key Collectathon already has a Steam page, but not many wishlists. This is because the page, and the game itself, are not very appealing to people who stumble upon it.

item.title: New blog!
item.description: On this blog I will post about my game development news. For now, if there is something I want to say about Cupig's Key Collectathon, I will say it here. This will also be the place where I announce new projects.
